text:
The #Chloroquine we rejected yesterday has now become the corner Stone for the treatment of #COVID19 today.
Chloroquine and two other drugs, Fapilavir and Gilead are currently being test run on several patients as the anti-viral drugs to cure #CoronaVirus

#StillWeRise
